name: tinyauth
tagline: A simple authentication and authorization service
description: TinyAuth is a self-hosted authentication and authorization service that manages users, roles, and tokens. It exposes a simple admin web UI and APIs to integrate authentication into other services.

features.title: User Management
features.description: Create and manage user accounts with passwords, profiles, and metadata

features.title: REST API
features.description: Issue JWT or API tokens for authenticating users in other applications

features.title: Admin Interface
features.description: Manage users, roles, and settings through a straightforward web administration panel

features.title: Api Integration
features.description: Integrate authentication into other services using REST API endpoints

features.title: Oauth Support
features.description: Provide OAuth2 authentication for third-party applications and services

features.title: Session Management
features.description: Track active sessions and provide logout functionality across applications

features.title: Password Policies
features.description: Enforce password complexity requirements and expiration policies for security
